ServerGroup.Name: Welcome to Canada - Beta Testers Version

Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v3
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0
For more information on this mod please visit the 7 days to Die forum located here: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?86541-Welcome-to-Canada
NOTE: Please pre-sync this mod the first time you install. This is a VERY LARGE mod so give it time to install. After the initial download you will only recieve updated files causing must faster loading times than previous versions. Keep auto updates checked.
The following download link is for mod launcher use ONLY! For a direct download link or server admin files, please visit the forum.

Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v3 - CompoPack
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0 - w/ Compo pack The same mod but with all kinds of new buildings made by various modders.

The following download link is for mod launcher use ONLY! For a direct download link or server admin files, please visit the forum.

Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v3 - Vanilla Backpack
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0 - no big backpack mod. (Not Active DO NOT INSTALL) Same as normal version but with vanilla backpack and vehicle storage.

Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v3 - Romero Mode
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0 - Romero Mode (Not Active DO NOT INSTALL) Same as original but with headshots only, more zeds and slower zeds

Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v3 - Easy Mode
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0 - Easy Mode (Not Active DO NOT INSTALL) This is the easy version of the mod, if you find the rest of the versions of the mod too challenging, try this.
For more information on this mod please visit the 7 days to Die forum located here: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?86541-Welcome-to-Canada

Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v3 - Zombocalypse
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0 - Zombocalypse Mode (Not Active DO NOT INSTALL) The most challenging version of Welcome to Canada ever. Absolute Insanity.
Only play this if the regular mod is too easy or if you are some kind of sadist. For more information on this mod please visit the 7 days to Die forum located here: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?86541-Welcome-to-Canada
NOTE: Please pre-sync this mod the first time you install. This is a VERY LARGE mod so give it time to install. After the initial download you will only recieve updated files causing must faster loading times than previous versions. Keep auto updates checked.
The following download link is for mod launcher use ONLY! For a direct download link or server admin files, please visit the forum.

Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v3 - PVP Snowball Fight
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0 - PVP Snowball Fight (Not Active DO NOT INSTALL) A fun mode for friends to get together and have a snowball fight in a wintery paintball course.
